verse.roman:
laugākṣir māṅgaliḥ kulyaḥ
kuśīdaḥ kukṣir eva ca
pauṣyañji-siṣyā jagṛhuḥ
saṁhitās te śataṁ śatam

synonyms: laugākṣiḥ māṅgaliḥ kulyaḥ—Laugākṣi, Māṅgali and Kulya; kuśīdaḥ kukṣiḥ—Kuśīda and Kukṣi; eva—indeed; ca—also; pauṣyañji-śiṣyāḥ—disciples of Pauṣyañji; jagṛhuḥ—they took; saṁhitāḥ—collections; te—they; śatam śatam—each one hundred.
translation: Five other disciples of Pauṣyañji, namely Laugākṣi, Māṅgali, Kulya, Kuśīda and Kukṣi, each received one hundred saṁhitās.
